mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.title, a.body, a.created_at, a.updated_at, image.id image_id, image.filename, image.created_at image_created_at, image.updated_at image_updated_at, qa.id qa_id, qa.question, qa.answer, qa.created_at qa_created_at, qa.updated_at qa_updated_at, video.id video_id, video.url, video.created_at video_created_at, video.updated_at video_updated_at FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_image image ON a.id = image.article_id LEFT JOIN article_qa qa ON a.id = qa.article_id LEFT JOIN article_video video ON a.id = video.article_id;

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.body, a.created_at, a.updated_at, image.id image_id, image.filename, image.created_at image_created_at, image.updated_at image_updated_at, qa.id qa_id, qa.question, qa.answer, qa.created_at qa_created_at, qa.updated_at qa_updated_at, video.id video_id, video.url, video.created_at video_created_at, video.updated_at video_updated_at FROM article a LEFT JOIN article_image image ON a.id = image.article_id LEFT JOIN article_qa qa ON a.id = qa.article_id LEFT JOIN article_video video ON a.id = video.article_id WHERE a.id = #{id};
